thread.title: Best photos from the big game
thread.title_full: Best photos from the big game

title: Best photos from the big game
text:
Super Bowl LI: The best photos Updated 0103 GMT (0903 HKT) February 6, 2017 
Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds. Photos: Super Bowl LI: The best photos New England quarterback Tom Brady tries to tackle Atlanta's Robert Alford, who intercepted Brady and ran it back for an 82-yard touchdown in the second quarter of Super Bowl LI. Alford's score gave the Falcons a 20-0 lead. They lead 21-3 at the half. Hide Caption 1 of 21 Photos: Super Bowl LI: The best photos Atlanta tight end Austin Hooper catches a 19-yard touchdown pass from Matt Ryan in the second quarter. Hide Caption Photos: Super Bowl LI: The best photos Ryan throws a pass during the first half. Hide Caption Photos: Super Bowl LI: The best photos Atlanta running back Devonta Freeman scores the game's first touchdown on a 5-yard run. Hide Caption 4 of 21 Photos: Super Bowl LI: The best photos Alford recovers a second-quarter fumble by New England running back LeGarrette Blount. The turnover led to Freeman's touchdown. Hide Caption Photos: Super Bowl LI: The best photos Brady is helped up by one of his linemen, Joe Thuney. Hide Caption Photos: Super Bowl LI: The best photos Blount carries the ball past Atlanta's Jonathan Babineaux. Hide Caption Photos: Super Bowl LI: The best photos Atlanta wide receiver Julio Jones makes a catch in the second quarter. Hide Caption 8 of 21 Photos: Super Bowl LI: The best photos Ryan, the league's MVP this season, is hit after a throw early in the game. The game was scoreless at the end of the first quarter. Hide Caption Photos: Super Bowl LI: The best photos Brady is pressured by Atlanta's Grady Jarrett. Jarrett got one of Atlanta's two first-half sacks. Hide Caption Photos: Super Bowl LI: The best photos Freeman breaks a big run in the first quarter. Hide Caption 11 of 21 Photos: Super Bowl LI: The best photos New England wide receiver Julian Edelman is upended by Atlanta's Philip Wheeler in the first quarter. Hide Caption Photos: Super Bowl LI: The best photos The game is being played at NRG Stadium, home of the NFL's Houston Texans. Hide Caption 13 of 21 Photos: Super Bowl LI: The best photos Former President George H.W. Bush and his wife, Barbara, wave as they arrive for the pregame coin toss. They were both recently hospitalized. Hide Caption Photos: Super Bowl LI: The best photos Country singer Luke Bryan sings the national anthem. Hide Caption 15 of 21 Photos: Super Bowl LI: The best photos Brady points to the crowd before the start of the game. Brady has won four Super Bowls in his career, and he's been Super Bowl MVP three times. See all the Super Bowl MVPs in history Hide Caption Photos: Super Bowl LI: The best photos The Falcons take the field before the game. Hide Caption 17 of 21 Photos: Super Bowl LI: The best photos Rapper 2 Chainz, left, and R&B singer Usher pose for a photo before the game. Hide Caption 18 of 21 Photos: Super Bowl LI: The best photos Seattle defensive end Michael Bennett takes a selfie with actor Mark Wahlberg before the game. Bennett's brother Martellus plays for the Patriots. Wahlberg is a Patriots fan. Hide Caption 19 of 21 Photos: Super Bowl LI: The best photos A Patriots fan wears a hat that looks like a giant Super Bowl ring. See all of the Super Bowl rings Hide Caption Photos: Super Bowl LI: The best photos Atlanta owner Arthur Blank, left, greets New England owner Robert Kraft before the game. Hide Caption 21 of 21 See photos from Super Bowl LI, which is taking place in Houston on Sunday, February 5. More from Sport
